title: Submission of Orders published in the Gazettes under the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 to Parliament for approval
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Planning and Economic Development to submit the following Orders published under the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007, to Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet.

*	The Order under section 2 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007, published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2384/31 dated 2024 05 17.

*	The Order under sections 2 and 5 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007, published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2395/32 dated 2024 07 31.

*	The Order under section 2 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007, published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2404/19 dated 2024.10.02.

*	The Order under sections 2 and 5 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No. 48 of 2007, published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2406/02 dated 2024.10.14.

*	The Order under section 2 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007, published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2408/15 dated 2024.11.01.

*	The Order under section 2 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No. 48 of 2007, published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2412/38 dated 2024.11.30.
